---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/cosmos/claim-rewards/get-flow-status-completed
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://cosmos-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/836cc1d2-2f1b-484d-b6ec-903c04e5013d' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `withdraw_tx_broadcasting` to `completed`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "836cc1d2-2f1b-484d-b6ec-903c04e5013d",
  "state": "completed",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "cosmos1u85upk2v7pr65g0wv2976zleu6v8qjl9qprvzl",
    "validator_addresses": [
      "cosmosvaloper1tflk30mq5vgqjdly92kkhhq3raev2hnz6eete3"
    ],
    "memo": null,
    "gas_price": null,
    "gas_limit": null,
    "pubkey": "0a2102db66d27dd215f1a61e5f4gga098b5293cc1da6f5c3557974ad5f39a2ec0fe125",
    "withdraw_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "ab4f1ab8c23c94c4d7e56cf41a65eddca54927a146c3b45d680b6909a05e659d",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "52FDE97A89E3B50F8E222E7E82C819E679AAF4F68C2D36A4FEC0CB1E767E5B05",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "cosmos1u85upk2v7pr65g0wv2976zleu6v8qjl9qprvzl",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "network_code": "cosmos",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-12-15T10:28:37.690Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-12-15T10:35:34.610Z"
}
```

### Claim Rewards Flow Complete

Congratulations, you have successfully claimed your staking rewards paid in ATOM tokens.
